entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as having bright red eyes.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, mentioned as being stronger than Voldemort by chance.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Voldemort's snake, described as gliding away through the night.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Mentioned as being absent and unable to help Harry Potter.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people laughing in the night.

entities.name: voldemort's father
entities.description: The location where Harry Potter is being held captive.

relationships.description: Voldemort sees Harry Potter as a rival and wants to prove his power by killing him.
Voldemort is surrounded by Death Eaters who are laughing in the night.
Harry Potter's mother died for him, implying that Dumbledore might also be willing to help him.
Voldemort is whispering to Nagini and asking her to wait.
